content: भूमिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [भवंत्यस्मिन् भूतानि, भू-मि किच्च वा ङीप्] {@--1@} The earth (<ab>opp.</ab> स्वर्ग, गगन or पाताल); द्यौर्भूमिरापो हृदयं यमश्च <ls>Pt. 1. 182</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 74.</ls> {@--2@} Soil, ground; उत्खातिनी भूमिः <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; <ls>Ku. 1. 24.</ls> {@--3@} A territory, district, country, land; विदर्भभूमिः {@--4@} A place, spot, ground, plot of ground; प्रमदवनभूमयः <ls>Ś. 6</ls>; अधित्यकाभूमिः <ls>N. 22. 41</ls>; <ls>R. 1. 52</ls>, <ls n="R.">3. 61</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 58.</ls> {@--5@} A site, situation. {@--6@} Land, landed property. {@--7@} A story, the floor of a house; as in सप्तभूमिकः प्रासादः. {@--8@} Attitude, posture. {@--9@} A character or part (in a play); <ab>cf.</ab> भूमिका. {@--10@} Subject, object, receptacle; विश्वासभूमि, स्नेहभूमि &c. {@--11@} Degree, extent, limit; <ls>Ki. 10. 58.</ls> {@--12@} The tongue. {@--13@} The number ‘one’.
